Sun.en: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
Sun.de: Der Anwender materialisiert durch Z-Kraft seine Aura und greift damit das Ziel an. Die Stärke variiert je nach zugrunde liegender Attacke.

Moon.en: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
